channel.title: Live Music on Swing Dance Events in and around Heidelberg
channel.description: Recent content in Live Music on Swing Dance Events in and around Heidelberg

item.title: Gipsy Jazz Jam Session
item.description:
Live music of musicians in a café/bar starting at 8 p.m. Bar offers drinks to purchase and enough space to dance. Everyone can bring their own instrument and join from 9 p.m. onwards.

  • Facebook-Link

  • Instagramm-Link

  • Address: Emil-Maier-Straße 16, 69115 Heidelberg

  • Cost: ca. 5 € - 10 €

  • Time:

    • Start: 8 p.m.
    • End: approx. 11 p.m.

item.title: B.T.Switch
item.description:
Swing festival in Darmstadt with a special focus on switching.

B.T. Switch is our new festival that’s all about - you guessed it - switching and ambidancing. Get ready for a three-day deep dive into the blurry line between leading and following, backed up by three parties with live music to satisfy your swing cravings. As with every year, we have an overarching theme for the festival: this time, we look forward to diving into different ‘Rhythms & Grooves’.

The workshops will be held in four different levels, so that you can join regardless of whether you have danced the other role before or not. There will be six hours of dedicated switch/BiRol/ambidance content per level, one hour of bonus concept content that plays into the theme, plus an additional two open-level class slots and a community talk.

  • Address: Various locations in Darmstadt
  • Cost: depending on the classes chosen (registration closed on November 2, 2025), party passes might be available still.
  • Time: Friday (6 March until Sunday 8 March)

item.title: Swingin Charlie
item.description:
Swing festival in Karlsruhe by Swing in Karlsruhe e.V.

  • Address: Canisiushaus and other locations in Karlsruhe
  • Cost: depending on the classes chosen (Registration)
  • Time: Friday (28 November until Sunday 30 November)
